mapper.insert: insert into feedback ( articlescrap_id, ip, judge_level, judge_message, uname, email, doubt_level, feedback_type, create_time ) values ( #{articlescrap_id}, #{ip}, #{judge_level}, #{judge_message}, #{uname}, #{email}, #{doubt_level}, #{feedback_type}, now() )
mapper.select: select count(1) from feedback where articlescrap_id=#{articlescrap_id} and judge_level=#{judge_level}
